live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
57984.summary: Some customers in the Westbank and West Kelowna areas of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet and Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57984.title: Feb 17 - Kelowna (Westbank, West Kelowna) | Internet/Video Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

Our technicians have been able to restore service to the majority of affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you.
Due to complexity of the outage, our technicians continue to repair services in to the night.
Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
57972.summary: Some customers in the Glen Valley & Aldergrove areas of Langley as well as the Bradner area of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57972.title: Feb 16 - Langley/Abbotsford (Glen Valley, Aldergrove & Bradner) | All Services - Outage (Resolve)
